sentences.sContent: Sacrifice in garden garden father that day, companionate people still had seen him.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sacrifice in garden garden father that day, companionate people still had seen him.
sentences.sCn: 在园园爸爸牺牲的当天，伙伴们还见过他。

sentences.sContent: In maths talent collect is overcome and companionate people fall hard, doctoral plot is final and undone.
sentences.sContent_eng: In maths talent collect is overcome and companionate people fall hard, doctoral plot is final and undone.
sentences.sCn: 在数学天才罗克和伙伴们的努力下，博士的阴谋最终破灭。

synos.tran: 伙伴的，同伴的；友爱的，友好的

trans.tranOther: resembling, appropriate to, or acting as a companion
